encased_stone.name: Potion of Encased Stone
encased_stone.description: Armour class increased by 1d (AC/2), lasts 2 rounds

absconded_stars.name: Potion of Absconded Stars
absconded_stars.description: Regain Spell slots (uses) equal to 1d (maximum spell slots)

uncanny_reactions.name: Potion of Uncanny Reactions
uncanny_reactions.description: Allows a reaction to be taken to any opponent's action (1 round)

fleetfoot.name: Potion of Fleetfoot
fleetfoot.description: Each round your speed increases by (movement last round) + 50%. This lasts for 2 rounds. Ends if no movement taken.

miracle_shield.name: Potion of Miracle Shield
miracle_shield.description: If a hit would reduce you to 0 hp, you are instead reduced to 1 hp. Lasts 1 round.

devils_deal.name: Potion of Devils Deal
devils_deal.description: Health decreased to 1, damage taken as a result is added to the next attack. Lasts 1 round. Can be used as a bonus acton.

atttribute_whispers.name: Potion of attribute whispers
atttribute_whispers.description: Pick any atttibute (strength, dexterity, constitution, intelligence, wisdom, charisma) and increase it by 1d (attribute total). Lasts 1 round.

tether.name: Potion of Tether
tether.description: Any damage you take is also dealt to the attacker. Any damage the attacker takes it also dealt to you. Lasts 2 rounds.
